scripts.test:node-1: start npm run test:evm-1 && timeout 5 && start npm run test:blockchain-1
scripts.test:node-2: start npm run test:evm-2 && timeout 5 && start npm run test:blockchain-2
scripts.test:node-3: start npm run test:evm-3 && timeout 5 && start npm run test:blockchain-3
scripts.test:2-nodes: start npm run test:evm-1 && start npm run test:evm-2 && timeout 10 && start npm run test:blockchain-1 && timeout 3 && start npm run test:blockchain-2
scripts.test:3-evms: start npm run test:evm-1 && start npm run test:evm-2 && start npm run test:evm-3
scripts.test:3-blockchains: start npm run test:blockchain-1 && timeout 3 && start npm run test:blockchain-2 && timeout 3 && start npm run test:blockchain-3
scripts.test:3-nodes: npm run test:3-evms && timeout 10 && npm run test:3-blockchains
scripts.dev: start npm run evm && timeout 5 && start npm run blockchain
scripts.stop: (for /f "tokens=5" %A in ('netstat -nao -p TCP ^| findstr 3001') do @wmic process where processid=%A get processid,parentprocessid | findstr %A >tempfile) & (for /f "tokens=1" %A in (tempfile) do echo about to kill process %A & taskkill /F /PID %A ) && (del tempfile)
